regex.name: select
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import xbmcgui dialog = xbmcgui.Dialog() ret = dialog.select('Elige un Canal ', ['SPACE Canelo vs GGG', 'ESPN LA', 'ESPN 2', 'UNIVISION TDN', 'TDN', 'CDF', 'ESPN 3', 'ESPN 3 - LA LIGA', 'UNIVISION DEPORTES', 'CLARO SPORTS', 'FOX SPORTS LA', 'FOX SPORTS 2', 'IMAGEN TV', 'TVC DEPORTES', 'Canal 5', 'Azteca 7']) lists = ['space', 'espnla', 'espn2', 'unitdn', 'tdn', 'cdf', 'espn3', 'espn3la', 'unidep', 'clarosport', 'foxsportla', 'foxsport2', 'imagentv', 'tvcdep', 'tele5', 'azteca7'] return lists[ret]

regex.name: select
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import xbmcgui dialog = xbmcgui.Dialog() ret = dialog.select('Elige un Canal ', ['Directv 2', 'Directv plus', 'CDF', 'ESPN', 'ESPN2', 'TDN', 'CANAL 5', 'AZTECA 7', 'UNIVISION', 'FOX DEPORTES', 'FOX SPORTS 2']) lists = ['http://www.superligatv.com/directv-2-hd-en-vivo-por-internet/', 'http://www.superligatv.com/directv-plus-en-vivo-por-internet/', 'http://www.superligatv.com/cdf-sports-en-vivo-por-internet/', 'http://www.superligatv.com/espn-en-vivo-por-internet/', 'http://www.superligatv.com/espn-2-en-vivo-por-internet/', 'http://www.superligatv.com/tdn-mx-hd-en-vivo-por-internet/', 'http://www.superligatv.com/canal-5-en-vivo-por-internet/', 'http://www.superligatv.com/azteca-7-en-vivo-por-internet/', 'http://www.superligatv.com/univision-en-vivo-por-internet/', 'http://www.superligatv.com/fox-deportes-en-vivo/', 'http://www.superligatv.com/fox-sports-2-en-vivo-por-internet/'] return lists[ret]

item.title: [B]Multicanal PSN Deportes (Rivo) [/B]
item.link: https://mp4-rem.vaughnsoft.net/play/live_katyhd.flv?&secure=$doregex[secure]|Referer=https://vaughn.live&Origin=https://vaughn.live&User-Agent=Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/60.0.3112.90 Safari/537.36

regex.name: get-url
regex.expres: #$pyFunction from resolveurl.plugins.lib import jsunpack def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import re import requests mozhdr = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.3; WOW64; rv:55.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/55.0', 'Referer': 'http://vipracing.info/'} url = 'http://vipracing.info/channel/canal-0' html = requests.get(url, headers=mozhdr).text cid = re.findall("id='([^']+).+?telerium", html)[0] eurl = 'https://telerium.tv/embed/{}.html'.format(cid) ehtml = requests.get(eurl, headers=mozhdr).text edata = re.findall('(eval\(function\(p,a,c,k,e,d.*)', ehtml)[0] epage = jsunpack.unpack(edata).replace('\\', '') strvar = re.findall('source:([^,]+),mime', epage)[0] str1 = re.findall('{}=atob\(rSt\(([^)]+)'.format(strvar), epage)[0] str2 = re.findall('{}="([^"]+)'.format(str1), epage)[0][::-1].decode('base64') tok1, tok2 = re.findall('{url:atob\(rSt\(([^)]+)\)\)\+atob\(rSt\(([^)]+)', epage)[0] tok1 = re.findall('{}="([^"]+)'.format(tok1), epage)[0][::-1].decode('base64') tok2 = re.findall('{}="([^"]+)'.format(tok2), epage)[0][::-1].decode('base64') tokurl = 'https:{}{}'.format(tok1, tok2) mozhdr['Referer'] = eurl token = requests.get(tokurl, headers=mozhdr).text[::-1][1:-1] strurl = 'https:{}{}|Referer={}&User-Agent={}'.format(str2, token, eurl, mozhdr['User-Agent']) return strurl

itm.title: [B]Multicanal Zonasport05[/B]

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction import re,requests def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m):#streamwatcher2013 from urlresolver.plugins.lib import jsunpack source=requests.get(re.findall('src="(.*?kastream[^"]+)',page_data)[0],headers={'Referer':'http://cdn.zonasports.es/c-5x.php'}).text return 'http://'+re.findall('Clappr.Player[\w\W]*?source.+?//([^\'"]+)',jsunpack.unpack(re.findall('id="Player"(?s)(.*?)</script',source)[0]).replace('\\',''))[0]+'|User-Agent=iPad'

select #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import xbmcgui dialog = xbmcgui.Dialog() ret = dialog.select('Elige un Canal ', ['vtv-1', 'vtv-2', 'vtv-3', 'who-1', 'who-2', 'who-3', 'net-1', 'net-2', 'net-3', 'w-1', 'w-2', 'w-3', 'w-1-1', 'w-2-2', 'w-3-3']) lists = ['https://cndf94.blogspot.com/p/vtv-1.html', 'https://cndf94.blogspot.com/p/vtv-2.html', 'https://cndf94.blogspot.com/p/vtv-3.html', 'https://cndf94.blogspot.com/p/who-1.html', 'https://cndf94.blogspot.com/p/who-2.html', 'https://cndf94.blogspot.com/p/who-3.html', 'https://cndf94.blogspot.com/p/net-1.html', 'https://cndf94.blogspot.com/p/net-2.html', 'https://cndf94.blogspot.com/p/net-3.html', 'https://cndf94.blogspot.com/p/w-1.html', 'https://cndf94.blogspot.com/p/w-2.html', 'https://cndf94.blogspot.com/p/w-3.html', 'https://cndf94.blogspot.com/p/w-1.html', 'https://cndf94.blogspot.com/p/w-2.html', 'https://cndf94.blogspot.com/p/w-3.html'] return lists[ret]
[B]Multicanal WIZHD 10[I] [/I][/B] $doregex[url]
url #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import re,requests headers = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (X11 Linux i686 rv:42.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/42.0 Iceweasel/42.0', 'Referer': 'http://schedule.racing/sevenembed.php?id=wiz10&p=0&c=0&stretching=uniform'} url = '$doregex[url2]' source = requests.get(url, headers=headers).text data1 = re.findall('return\(\[([^\]]+)', source)[0] data2 = re.findall('\+ ([^\.]+).join', source)[0] data2 = re.findall(data2 + ' = \W(.+)\]', source)[0] data1 = ''.join(data1).replace('"','').replace(',', '').replace(' ', '').replace('\/','/') data2 = ''.join(data2).replace('"','').replace(',', '').replace(' ', '').replace('\/','/') data3 = re.findall('getElementById\W"([^"]+)', source)[0] data3 = re.findall(data3 + '\W*(.+?=*)\W', source)[0] return data1 + data2 + data3
url2 src="([^"]+) http://schedule.racing/sevenembed.php?id=wiz10&p=0&c=0&stretching=uniform http://wizhdsports.is/live/stream10.html
